Trackers

Class Tracker

  • java.lang.Object
    • Trackers.Tracker
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    DHTTracker, HTTPTracker, UDPTracker

    public abstract class Tracker
extends java.lang.Object
    Generic tracker class. 3 types of trackers: UDP DHT HTTP
    Author:
    wiselion
